title: Is existentialism dead? What would Nietzche say? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nietzsche is dead. Nihilism I wish was dead. Relativism I wish was dead. Selfishness is not dead. The falling sensation Nietzsche mentioned is not a dream or fantasy, but a nightmare. One which people unfortunately are duped into following or internalizing. It’s the ultimate in toxicity of the human spirit and betrayal (E tu brute).
